question:
[Harry] is buying his daughter [Isabel] a brand new car for her birthday. [Morgan] asked her daughter, [Ouida], if she had fun at school that day. [Ouida] answered that she and her sister, [Danielle], had lots of fun together. [Dale] and his son [Donald] loved to go to the movies with [Dale]'s sister [Valerie]. [Darryl] and [Robert] were both still very upset with their mother, [Valerie]. [Donald] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Danielle]. [Harry] bought gifts for his lovely sister, [Morgan] [Isabel] went to dinner with her daughter [Joy]. They then went to the park afterwards.
Question: How is [Darryl] related to [Joy]?
